testcase.purpose: Test if widget.description is set correctly.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the description element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the author element.
Test that nested RLO and LRO directions apply within the description element.
Test that nested RLO and LRO directions apply within the author element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test if the attribute 'name' is on the window.
Test that a UA correctly implements the NoInterfaceObject extended attribute.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'preferences' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'preferences' is readonly on the window.

Test that upon getting any of the attributes from the attributes column of the configuration attributes table, a user agent must return the corresponding value from the 'Values in Table of Configuration Defaults' column.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'shortName' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'shortName' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'shortName' is string on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'version' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'version' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'version' is string on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'width' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'width' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'width' is number on the window.
Test that RTL direction applies to the description element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the author element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the span element within the description element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the span element within the author element.
Test that nested RTL and RTL directions apply within the description element.
Test that nested RTL and RTL directions apply within the author element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'id' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'id' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'id' is string on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'name' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'name' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'author' is string on the window.
Test if the UA initializes the preferences attribute and not fire the storage event.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'description' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'description' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'description' is string on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'height' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'height' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'height' is number on the window.
Test that LRO direction applies to the description element.
Test that LRO direction applies to the author element.
Test that LRO direction applies to the span element within the description element.
Test that LRO direction applies to the span element within the author element.
Test that nested LRO and RLO directions apply within the description element.
Test that nested LRO and RLO directions apply within the author element.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'widget' on the window object.
Test if the UA initializes the preferences attribute according to the spec.
Test if widget.author is set correctly.
Test if widget.authorEmail is set correctly.
Test if widget.authorHref is set correctly.
Test if widget.id is set correctly.
Test if widget.version is set correctly.
Test if widget.shortName is set correctly.
Test that the user agent returns a number as the value type of widget width.
Test that the user agent returns a number as the value type of widget height.
Test that the UA throws a NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR when trying to set a readonly key.
Test that the UA throws a NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR when trying to invoke removeItem on a readonly key.
Test that the UA does not throw a NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR when clear() is invoked.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'author' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'author' is readonly on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'authorEmail' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'authorEmail' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'authorEmail' is string on the window.
Test if the UA has an attribute called 'authorHref' on the window.
Test if the attribute 'authorHref' is readonly on the window.
Test if the type of attribute 'authorHref' is string on the window.
Test that LTR direction applies to the description element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the author element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the span element within the description element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the span element within the author element.
Test that nested LTR and RTL directions apply within the description element.
Test that nested LTR and RTL directions apply within the author element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the name element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the short attribute of the name element.
Test that RLO direction is inherited by the name element from the widget element.
Test that RLO direction is inherited by the short attribute of the name element from the widget element.
Test that RLO direction is inherited by the description element from the widget element.
Test that RLO direction is inherited by the author element from the widget element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the id attribute of widget element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the name element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the short attribute of the name element.
Test that RTL direction is inherited by the name element from the widget element.
Test that RTL direction is inherited by the short attribute of the name element from the widget element.
Test that RTL direction is inherited by the description element from the widget element.
Test that RTL direction is inherited by the author element from the widget element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that LRO direction is inherited by the description element from the widget element.
Test that LRO direction is inherited by the author element from the widget element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that LRO direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the name element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the short attribute of the name element.
Test that LTR direction is inherited by the name element from the widget element.
Test that LTR direction is inherited by the short attribute of the name element from the widget element.
Test that LTR direction is inherited by the description element from the widget element.
Test that LTR direction is inherited by the author element from the widget element.
